summary: Trump later admitted he decided to fire Comey first, then sought justification from DoJ.

statements.quote: And today's actions had zero to do with that. Today's actions have everything to do with what Mr. Rosenstein, the Deputy Attorney General, who oversees the FBI Director…

I think he’s heard from the rank and file of the FBI, but particularly someone who had done a thorough review and someone who has the respect and reputation that the deputy attorney general has, he took that seriously. He took the recommendation seriously. And he made a decision based on that.
No one from the White House. That was a DOJ decision.

name: Trump fired Comey only at request of DoJ officials
